thread.title: Domestic car sales rise 6% in August, motorcycle sales decline 9.59%
thread.title_full: Domestic car sales rise 6% in August, motorcycle sales decline 9.59% | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Domestic car sales rise 6% in August, motorcycle sales decline 9.59%
text:
Other Articles Domestic car sales up 6% in Aug; bikes down 9.59% Mahindra aims to expand market share with TUV 300 Uber, Ola could eat into auto sales, says Anand Mahindra Domestic passenger car sales rose 6.06 per cent to 1,63,093 units in August from 1,53,781 units in the same month a year ago.
However, motorcycle sales declined 9.59 per cent to 8,23,053 units last month from 9,10,312 units a year ago, according to the data released by the Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers (SIAM).
Total two-wheeler sales in August was down 2.98 per cent to 13,05,350 units as against 13,45,506 units in the same month last year.
Sales of commercial vehicles were up 7.58 per cent to 52,198 units in August, SIAM said.
Vehicle sales across categories registered a decline of 2.07 per cent to 16,26,148 units from 16,60,512 units in August 2014, it added.
 10, 2015 12:26 pm
